description: Coordinates comprehensive submission evaluation with technical analysis, behavioral context compilation, and appropriate routing for human review

technical_analysis.functionality_assessment: The submitted code meets the specified functionality requirements effectively. It is well-structured and logically organized, showing a clear understanding of the problem-solving process.
strengths: Good use of modular design, contributing to readability
Efficient algorithmic approach, minimizing time complexity
areas_for_improvement: Could improve comments for better understanding of complex logic
Consider more thorough input validation for edge cases

behavioral_context_summary.student_explanation: I coded in VS Code locally, then pasted my solution.

similarity_analysis.comparison_notes: No significant similarities with other submissions detected.
